items.title: Alabama’s E.O. Wilson Land Between the Rivers Preserve Is a ‘Place That Time Forgot’
bullets: • The Land Between the Rivers Preserve is a sprawling expanse of undeveloped swamps, bogs, streams and forest in south Alabama

• Hundreds of trees have survived decades if not centuries of floods and established roots deep enough to keep standing

items.title: A classified network of SpaceX satellites is emitting a mysterious signal
bullets: • Satellites associated with the Starshield satellite network appear to be transmitting to the Earth's surface on frequencies normally used for doing the opposite: sending commands from Earth to satellites in space
• The use of those frequencies to "downlink" data runs counter to standards set by the International Telecommunication Union

items.title: Blind patients read again with smart glasses-linked eye implant
bullets: • Age-related macular degeneration (AMD) cannot be reversed because cells in the center of the patients’ retinas die over time
• The study focused on restoring some of that lost vision using a 2-by-2-millimeter device made of tiny photovoltaic solar panels
• The device was surgically implanted under the retina in the patient’s eye
• Patients wore camera-equipped smart glasses, which transmitted zoomed-in images of the world to the retinal implant using near infrared light
